base_description: Medium-sized blue bottle with red pump.
part_description: The bottle has a cylindrical shape with a narrow neck. It features a red pump on top, consisting of a nozzle and a push-down mechanism. The main body is blue, tapering towards the neck.
internal_interaction_description: The pump mechanism includes a spring and tube inside, allowing liquid to be drawn up from the bottle. When the pump is pressed, the spring compresses, forcing liquid through the tube and out the nozzle.
external_interaction_description: The pump bottle dispenses liquid when pressed by a user. It can hold various liquids like soap or lotion, interacting with external elements by providing controlled dispensing and minimizing spillage.
